data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Willy Delajod signals a Angers throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nantes.
Free kick Nantes.
In the minute 5, Nantes's Mehdi Abeid breaks free at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Angers have a goal kick.
Angers to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes.
In the minute 13, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Free kick for Angers in the half of Nantes.
Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 20, Nantes attack but Abdoulaye Toure's header doesn't find the target.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes.
In the minute 22, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes just outside Angers's area.
Angers will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nantes.
Nantes's Andrei gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Angers defender.
In the minute 23, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Mehdi Abeid (Nantes) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 28, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Nantes.
Angers needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Free kick Angers.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In Nantes Angers attack through Thomas Mangani. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Nantes.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Angers in the half of Nantes.
Thomas Mangani gets his shot on target but fails to score for Angers.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Goal! Angers take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Romain Thomas.
In the minute 42, Thomas Mangani instrumental with a fine assist.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Willy Delajod signals a Angers throw-in in Nantes's half.
At Stade de la Beaujoire the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Charles Traore is booked for the home team.
In the minute 46, Willy Delajod has blown to start the second-half.
Antonin Bobichon of Angers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 48, Nantes's Moses Simon gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Willy Delajod awards Angers a goal kick.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 49, Jimmy Cabot for Angers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Willy Delajod awards Nantes a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Nantes make their second substitution with Pedro Chirivella replacing Renaud Emond.
Randal Kolo Muani is replacing Abdoulaye Toure for the home team.
The home team have replaced Imran Louza with Marcus Coco. This is the first substitution made today by Patrick Collot.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 62, Nicolas Pallois (Nantes) gets a yellow card.
Nantes have a goal kick.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Angers.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Lois Diony with Stephane Bahoken.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Sebastien Corchia is on a sub for Fabio for Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 71, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Ludovic Blas (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Antonin Bobichon with Mathias Pereira Lage.
Farid El Melali is replacing Jimmy Cabot for the away team.
In the minute 77, In Nantes Angers attack through Jimmy Cabot. The finish is off target, however.
Willy Delajod awards Nantes a goal kick.
Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 81, Angers advance rapidly upfield but Willy Delajod blows for offside.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Angers.
Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 88, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
Bridge Ndilu is replacing Ludovic Blas for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Nantes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
So close for Nantes as Bridge Ndilu's shot comes back off the post.
Angers's Pierrick Capelle gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Angers.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Nantes. The final score is 1-1.
Charles Traore grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stade de la Beaujoire.
